answerText: Laffer Curve[10] Another graphical construct is this one, which is made out of indifference curves. Named for the man who wrote Mathematical Psychics, it diplays the optimal distribution of resources among the two paricipants.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Chicago Culture Heroes and Psychopomps | 1 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: .Early versions of this concept can be found in Ibn Khaldun's Muqaddimah and the works of Adam Smith and Ludwig von Mises. FTPE,   [10] This graphical construct is at the heart of supply-side economics, positing that raising tax rates doesn't always raise tax revenue.
